name: Penzias, Wilson, and Cosmic Background Radiation
name_original: Penzias, Wilson, and Cosmic Background Radiation
description:
"Penzias and Wilson were credited for the discovery of Cosmic Background Radiation but in all honesty, it was an accident"

Year 10, Term 3 "I'm a scientist, get me out of here!" assignment.
Made with Ren'Py
Character sprites: @__sarah_art__ on instagram
Script and code/ backgrounds:@_isabelhopping_ on instagram

This was a school assignment, and highly simplified. For more information please look at our sources and enjoy the game!

Research done by the both of us

We hope you enjoy our first ever video game,
Isabel Hopping and Sarah Wang
